verses.verse: Then the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> the whole <WH3605> congregation, <WH5712> came <WH935> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> in the first <WH7223> month; <WH2320> and the people <WH5971> stayed <WH3427> at Kadesh. <WH6946> Now Miriam <WH4813> died <WH4191> there <WH8033> and was buried <WH6912> there. <WH8033>
And there was no <WH3808> water <WH4325> for the congregation; <WH5712> and they assembled <WH6950> themselves against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron. <WH175>

The people <WH5971> thus contended <WH7378> with Moses <WH4872> and spoke, <WH559> saying, <WH559> "If <WH3863> only <WH3863> we had perished <WH1478> when our brothers <WH251> perished <WH1478> before <WH6440> the Lord! <WH3068>
"Why <WH4100> then have you brought <WH935> the Lord's assembly <WH6951> into this <WH2088> wilderness, <WH4057> for us and our beasts <WH1165> to die <WH4191> here <WH8033>?

"And why <WH4100> have you made us come <WH5927> up from Egypt, <WH4714> to bring <WH935> us in to this <WH2088> wretched <WH7451> place <WH4725>? It is not a place <WH4725> of grain <WH2233> or figs <WH8384> or vines <WH1612> or pomegranates, <WH7416> nor <WH369> is there <WH369> water <WH4325> to drink. <WH8354>"

Then Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> came <WH935> in from the presence <WH6440> of the assembly <WH6951> to the doorway <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting, <WH4150> and fell <WH5307> on their faces. <WH6440> Then the glory <WH9202> of the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to them;
and the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Take <WH3947> the rod; <WH4294> and you and your brother <WH251> Aaron <WH175> assemble <WH6950> the congregation <WH5712> and speak <WH1696> to the rock <WH5553> before their eyes, <WH5869> that it may yield <WH5414> its water. <WH4325> You shall thus bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> water <WH4325> for them out of the rock <WH5553> and let the congregation <WH5712> and their beasts <WH1165> drink. <WH8248>"
So Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the rod <WH4294> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> the Lord, <WH3068> just <WH9201> as He had commanded <WH6680> him;

and Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> gathered <WH6950> the assembly <WH6951> before <WH413> <WH6440> the rock. <WH5553> And he said <WH559> to them, "Listen <WH8085> now, <WH4994> you rebels; <WH4784> shall we bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> water <WH4325> for you out of this <WH2088> rock <WH5553>?"

Then Moses <WH4872> lifted <WH7311> up his hand <WH3027> and struck <WH5221> the rock <WH5553> twice <WH6471> with his rod; <WH4294> and water <WH4325> came <WH3318> forth <WH3318> abundantly, <WH7227> and the congregation <WH5712> and their beasts <WH1165> drank. <WH8354>

But the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses <WH4872> and Aaron, <WH175> "Because <WH3282> you have not believed <WH539> Me, to treat <WH6942> Me as holy <WH6942> in the sight <WH5869> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> therefore <WH3651> you shall not bring <WH935> this <WH2088> assembly <WH6951> into the land <WH776> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> them."

Those <WH1992> [were] the waters <WH4325> of Meribah, <WH4809> because <WH834> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> contended <WH7378> with the Lord, <WH3068> and He proved <WH6942> Himself holy <WH6942> among them.

From Kadesh <WH6946> Moses <WH4872> then sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to the king <WH4428> of Edom: <WH9000> "Thus <WH3541> your brother <WH251> Israel <WH3478> has said, <WH559> 'You know <WH3045> all <WH3605> the hardship <WH8513> that has befallen <WH4672> us;

that our fathers went <WH1> down <WH3381> to Egypt, <WH3381> and we stayed <WH4714> in Egypt <WH3427> a long <WH4714> time, <WH7227> and the Egyptians <WH3117> treated <WH4714> us and our fathers badly. <WH7489>

'But when we cried <WH6817> out to the Lord, <WH3068> He heard <WH8085> our voice <WH6963> and sent <WH7971> an angel <WH4397> and brought <WH3318> us out from Egypt; <WH4714> now behold, <WH2009> we are at Kadesh, <WH6946> a town <WH5892> on the edge <WH7097> of your territory. <WH1366>

'Please <WH4994> let us pass <WH5674> through your land. <WH776> We shall not pass <WH5674> through <WH5674> field <WH7704> or through vineyard; <WH3754> we shall not even drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> from a well. <WH875> We shall go <WH1980> along the king's highway, <WH1870> not turning <WH5186> to the right <WH3225> or left, <WH8040> until <WH5704> <WH834> we pass <WH5674> through <WH5674> your territory. <WH1366>' "
Edom, <WH9000> however, said <WH559> to him, "You shall not pass <WH5674> through <WH5674> us, lest <WH6435> I come <WH3318> out with the sword <WH2719> against <WH7122> you."

Again, the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> to him, "We shall go <WH5927> up by the highway, <WH4546> and if <WH518> I and my livestock <WH4735> do drink <WH8354> any of your water, <WH4325> then I will pay <WH5414> its price. <WH4377> Let me only <WH7534> pass <WH5674> through <WH5674> on my feet, <WH7272> nothing <WH369> <WH1697> [else.]"

But he said, <WH559> "You shall not pass <WH5674> through. <WH5674>" And Edom <WH9000> came <WH3318> out against <WH7122> him with a heavy <WH3515> force, <WH5971> and with a strong <WH2389> hand. <WH3027>
Thus Edom <WH9000> refused <WH3985> to allow <WH5414> Israel <WH3478> to pass <WH5674> through <WH5674> his territory; <WH1366> so Israel <WH3478> turned <WH5186> away <WH5186> from him.
Now when they set <WH5265> out from Kadesh, <WH6946> the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> the whole <WH3605> congregation, <WH5712> came <WH935> to Mount <WH2022> Hor. <WH2023>
Then the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> at Mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> by the border <WH1366> of the land <WH776> of Edom, <WH9000> saying, <WH559>

"Aaron <WH175> shall be gathered <WH622> to his people; <WH9415> for he shall not enter <WH935> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> because <WH5921> <WH834> you rebelled <WH4784> against <WH854> My command <WH6310> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah. <WH4809>
"Take <WH3947> Aaron <WH175> and his son <WH1121> Eleazar, <WH499> and bring <WH5927> them up to Mount <WH2022> Hor; <WH2023>

and strip <WH6584> Aaron <WH175> of his garments <WH899> and put <WH3847> them on his son <WH1121> Eleazar. <WH499> So Aaron <WH175> will be gathered <WH622> [to his people,] and will die <WH4191> there. <WH8033> "

So Moses <WH4872> did <WH6213> just <WH9201> as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded, <WH6680> and they went <WH5927> up to Mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> the congregation. <WH5712>

And after Moses <WH4872> had stripped <WH6584> Aaron <WH175> of his garments <WH899> and put <WH3847> them on his son <WH1121> Eleazar, <WH499> Aaron <WH175> died <WH4191> there <WH8033> on the mountain <WH2022> top. <WH7218> Then Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> came <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the mountain. <WH2022>

And when all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> saw <WH7200> that Aaron <WH175> had died, <WH1478> all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> wept <WH1058> for Aaron <WH175> thirty <WH7970> days. <WH3117>
